title: List of Victorious skins in League

replies.body: I'm calling it now: it's gonna be Victorious Lulu

If it is I'm going to fucking commit.
Murder? Suicide? Treason?
Riot

> [{quoted}](name=Spank the Fox,realm=OCE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=vJG30O1A,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-16T18:48:10.431+0000)
>
> I'm calling it now: it's gonna be Victorious Lulu

victorious nami. am 100% sure
I hope so- I'd like a Nami skin I actually want to buy. All of my friends know Nami is my go-to Support and always ask why I don't have a skin- I don't like any of the skins she has.

> [{quoted}](name=SociopathFriend,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=vJG30O1A,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2017-09-17T06:43:43.645+0000)
>
> I hope so- I'd like a Nami skin I actually want to buy.

Jokes on you, you can't buy Victorious skins.

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

I can if I buy a gold account {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 


Nah, I'd just finally have a reason to play Ranked. Replace 'buy' with 'put any effort at all into played Ranked and climbing' and you get basically the same idea.

It's 100% Lulu.  She dominated throughout the entire spring split.  She was the only champion to have a 100% presence at MSI event.  She was picked/banned in every single game during the tournament.  She was a huge champion.
{{champion:432}} is my bet, it's most likely a support. If not a support then {{champion:3}}
https://i.gyazo.com/2b39dda17b35ab959621ae3c6bdec2a8.png

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

Victorious taliyah pleaseeeeeeeee
{{champion:114}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:134}}{{champion:61}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:43}}{{champion:69}}   are my bets

Karma just got her Conqueror skin. Fairly certain that counts toward deciding on this sort of thing, right? Or am I wrong? Also, Maokai got Victorious Maokai this previous season.

Maokai got the victorious skin last year he definitely won't be getting one this year.
lul yah I forgot, I was just going through and picking out what I thought would get it, same reason why I didn't put Janna on here.
why would kled get it

Im gambling its {{champion:238}} {{champion:103}} or {{champion:157}} 
(just a mid laner)
I bet it'll be {{champion:61}}
No way those 3 are getting it they didn't really do much compared to other picks in pro play.
Zed has Championship, Ahri has Challenger, Yasuo is reviled.

zed??? yasuo??? why would they get it
iirc zed was only picked for a bit cuz lethality changes
I call Orianna or Cassio.
But Cass just got a skin. She isn't allowed another for at least 4 more years, esports skin or not.
100% chance it's Victorious Viktor

> [{quoted}](name=Noblewind,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=vJG30O1A,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-09-16T18:49:43.791+0000)

Viktorious
i think Syndra have chance, But it will make a lot of skin for her in the year

> [{quoted}](name=Small Boobs Ahri,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=vJG30O1A,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-09-16T18:52:54.464+0000)
>
> i think Syndra have chance, But it will make a lot of skin for her in the year

syndra isnt getting 3 skins in a year tf
SKT1 Syndra and Victorious Syndra wouldn't count for her eligibility towards new skins.
Meanwhile Yorick is crying.

It's going to be Taliyah or Syndra.

Taliyah would be a nice gesture for the enormous skin shafting she has had, and she's seen a boost in high ELO play. Syndra because she is the only relevant mage left in the pro scene.

A mage doesn't have a Victorious skin yet either.

Morgana would like to speak to you

And don't try to tell me she's not a mage

We need an actual midlaner.. 
I don't care if Morgana is classified as a Mage.

That was the main point Karfuss brought up.

She got it for her support role.

She's no mage. On par with enchanters.

> [{quoted}](name=Karfuss,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=vJG30O1A,comment-id=000f00000001,timestamp=2017-09-16T23:11:48.661+0000)
>
> She got it for her support role.
> 
> She's no mage. On par with enchanters.

Morgana got her victorious skin in season 4 as a mage midlane
I'll bet it'll be Taliyah. She's been gamechanging.
I want the victorius zz'rot portal :C carried me to gold last season
That league name lol {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
( Í¡Â° ÍÊ Í¡Â°)
It better be a midlaner.. Morgana doesn't count.
I beg to differ. You gotta try her out mid. Great wave clear, great sustain, what's not to love?

Shes just not a midlaner.. like.. realistically speaking, c'mon.

How many times do you see her mid rather than at Support? Enough said right there ^^.

We need a real and popular midlaner victorious skin. Only logical.
we need freaking {{champion:112}} ious skin (he isn't going to get it anyway since he was unused for a lot of time)

Most likely a mage, considering they haven't made one specifically for mid lane yet. {{champion:25}} was given the victorious skin for her prevalence as a support during season 4. My money's on  {{champion:69}} {{champion:7}}  {{champion:90}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:91}} or {{champion:112}} . I'd like to add {{champion:134}} or {{champion:163}} to the list, but Syndra got 2 skins this year relatively close together and I believe a Rioter said they won't make a Victorious skin for a champ that only one skin after Victorious {{champion:60}} was released. So that rules out Taliyah. Would still like to see her one for Taliyah though. Also, I guess you could add {{champion:42}} and {{champion:236}} to the list since they were popular mid-laners throughout the season. However, since we got Victorious {{champion:15}} so recently I doubt we get two marksmen so close together.
they do it by what they believe to most relevant champion of pro play during the season. The role of the previous champion to get it wont have any impact on the decision of the following one.

I saw speculation on Lee Sin being the champ since Ashe and Lee Sin were the featured characters for the Worlds music track's art cover. Ashe already has the Championship Skin, so the thought process is that Lee will be the Victorious skin. Can't say I buy it, personally, nor do I want it. But logic SeemsOkay.
